name: Valley of the Waters B & B

reviews.title: Brilliant B&B in the Blue Mountains
reviews.text: Stayed at this B&B in January 2006 during a trip to Sydney. Fantastic location directly overlooking the mountains. There are only three rooms - all with spa baths and outside decks overlooking the valley. Any of these would be great but if you can get the top floor one which is slightly bigger. check out [--]

aka: Valley Of The Waters B & B Blue Mountains/Wentworth Falls
description: Escarpment located luxury B&B, architect designed for maximum privacy...all rooms with spectacular 100km cliff views, en-suites with large spa baths, own decks, air-conditioned, right at the start of the mountains finest rain forest and waterfalls hikes...cooked or continental breakfasts served to your room or deck ... the perfect start to your day and your memorable stay!
